description:
Get ready for the hacking, slashing battle of a lifetime in a new adaptation of the legendarily violent Sengoku Basara franchise. Based on the best-selling video games, the new installment of this action-packed anime revolves around one massive battle featuring mechanized samurai, mystical ninja, gun-toting warriors, and a blinding array of deadly special moves!

Note: Based on CAPCOM's 2010 game Sengoku Basara 3 (Sengoku Basara: Samurai Heroes), and it will depict the epic Battle of Sekigahara.

(Source: Crunchyroll, Anime News Network)

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Historical
tags.description: Partly or completely set during a real period of world history.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

node.description: Capcom began in Japan in 1979 as a manufacturer and distributor of electronic game machines. In 1983 Capcom Co., LTD was founded and soon built a reputation for introducing cutting-edge technology and software to the video game market.  Building on its origins as a game machine manufacturer, Capcom is now involved in all areas of the video game industry and has offices in Tokyo, Osaka, California, England, Germany, and Hong Kong.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/高橋ナツコ)

_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/193091/)._

**[Profile (ONEMUSIC)](http://one-music.jp/tokuda/index.html)**

Masahiro Tokuda is a Japanese musician, composer, arranger and guitarist.

name.first: Fear, and Loathing in Las Vegas
name.native: フィアー·アンド·ロージング·イン·ラスベガス

node.description:
[Website](http://www.lasvegas-jp.com) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Falilv) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/Falilv_Official/)

__Biography__
The band formed in 2008 in Kobe, Japan. Fear, and Loathing in Las Vegas combines electronica and metalcore, further exploring a number of influences from other genres among their discography. The singing is comprised of twin vocals; the destructive shouts of one vocalist contrasts with the autotune of the other, which gives them a presence like no other. In November 2009, their first EP "Burn the Disco Floor with Your 2-step!!" was released.

__Members__
- So - vocal, scream vocal, programming (joined in 2009)
- Minami - vocal, scream vocal, keyboard, programming
- Taiki - guitar, chorus, vocal
- Tomonori - drums
- Tetsuya - bass, chorus, vocal (joined in 2019)

__Former Members__
- Mashu - bass (left on September 21, 2013)
- Sxun - guitar, chorus, vocal (left on June 30, 2018)
- Kei - bass, chorus, vocal (died on January 12, 2019)
